allowGroups.description: Determines, wether course allows group creation.

nameSchema.description: If utilized, all group names will use the nameSchema followed by the group's number.

sizeMin.description: The required amount of members the group needs in order to submit group-assignments.

sizeMax.description: The maximum amount of members in a group.

selfmanaged.description: Indicates, wether the group is managed by its members.

autoJoinGroupOnCourseJoined.description: If enabled, participants that join the course will automatically join a group.

mergeGroupsOnAssignmentStarted.description: If enabled, groups that don't have enough members will be merged when an assignment starts.

shortname.description: Shortname of this course, i.e "java". Should be reused every semester. Will be used in URLs.

semester.description: Semester that the iteration of this course belong to.

title.description: The full title of this course, i.e Programming I: Java

isClosed.description: Determines, wether changes (i.e joining this course) can be made to this course.

state.description: Determines, wether students can submit, assessments should be published, etc.

startDate.description: Date at which this assignment should enter the IN_PROGRESS-state to allow submissions.

endDate.description: Date at which this assignment should enter the IN_REVIEW-state to disable submissions.

type.description: The type of assignment, i.e homework or project.

collaboration.description: Determines, wether students can submit their solutions in groups, alone or both.

points.description: The amount of points that can be reached by a participant (exluding bonus points).

bonusPoints.description: The amount of additional bonus points, which should be exluded from the admission criteria.

comment.description: Additional information or description of this assignment.

state.description: Determines, wether students can submit, assessments should be published, etc.

startDate.description: Date at which this assignment should enter the IN_PROGRESS-state to allow submissions.

endDate.description: Date at which this assignment should enter the IN_REVIEW-state to disable submissions.

type.description: The type of assignment, i.e homework or project.

collaboration.description: Determines, wether students can submit their solutions in groups, alone or both.

points.description: The amount of points that can be reached by a participant (exluding bonus points).

bonusPoints.description: The amount of additional bonus points, which should be exluded from the admission criteria.

comment.description: Additional information or description of this assignment.

password.description: Password required to enter the group.

hasPassword.description: Indicates, wether group has a password. Set by the server.

size.description: Count of group members. Set by the server.

isClosed.description: Determines, wether course participant are able to join this group.

state.description: Determines, wether students can submit, assessments should be published, etc.

startDate.description: Date at which this assignment should enter the IN_PROGRESS-state to allow submissions.

endDate.description: Date at which this assignment should enter the IN_REVIEW-state to disable submissions.

type.description: The type of assignment, i.e homework or project.

collaboration.description: Determines, wether students can submit their solutions in groups, alone or both.

points.description: The amount of points that can be reached by a participant (exluding bonus points).

bonusPoints.description: The amount of additional bonus points, which should be exluded from the admission criteria.

comment.description: Additional information or description of this assignment.

timespanDays.description: Time between start and end of the assignment (in days).

password.description: Password required to sign up for the course.
Password required to sign up for the course.

allowGroups.description: Determines, wether course allows group creation.

nameSchema.description: If utilized, all group names will use the nameSchema followed by the group's number.

sizeMin.description: The required amount of members the group needs in order to submit group-assignments.

sizeMax.description: The maximum amount of members in a group.

selfmanaged.description: Indicates, wether the group is managed by its members.

autoJoinGroupOnCourseJoined.description: If enabled, participants that join the course will automatically join a group.

mergeGroupsOnAssignmentStarted.description: If enabled, groups that don't have enough members will be merged when an assignment starts.

canJoin.description: Indicates, wether the joining the course is possible.

requiresPassword.description: Indicates, wether the joining the course requires a password.

reason.description: The reason why joining the course is not possible.

assignedEvaluatorId.description: UserId of the assigned evaluator (for assignment).

assessmentId.description: Id of the assessment for this user, if it exists.

shortname.description: Shortname of this course, i.e "java". Should be reused every semester. Will be used in URLs.

semester.description: Semester that the iteration of this course belong to.

title.description: The full title of this course, i.e Programming I: Java

isClosed.description: Determines, wether changes (i.e joining this course) can be made to this course.

nameSchema.description: If utilized, all group names will use the nameSchema followed by the group's number.

count.description: The number of groups that should be created. Should only be used in conjunction with nameSchema.

assignedEvaluatorId.description: UserId of the assigned evaluator (for assignment).

assessmentId.description: Id of the assessment, if it exists.

assignmentId.description: Identifier of the assignment that is being evaluated by this assessment.

isDraft.description: Marks the assessment as a draft.

achievedPoints.description: The amount of points that the student or group achieved with their submission.

groupId.description: If a group submission is being evaluated, contains the identifier of the group.

userId.description: If a single user is being evaluated, contains the identifier of the user.

creatorId.description: Identifier of the creator of this assessment.

lastUpdatedById.description: Identifier of the last user that updated this assessment.

groupId.description: GroupId of the group, whose solution should be evaluated by the assigned evaluator.

userId.description: UserId of the user, whose solution should be evaluated by the assigned evaluator.

assignmentId.description: Identifier of the assignment that is being evaluated by this assessment.

isDraft.description: Marks the assessment as a draft.

achievedPoints.description: The amount of points that the student or group achieved with their submission.

groupId.description: If a group submission is being evaluated, contains the identifier of the group.

userId.description: If a single user is being evaluated, contains the identifier of the user.

url.description: Complete URL to an endpoint in your application that receives HTTP-POST messages.

events.description: Map of events that you want to be notified about. Refer to the Event-Enum for event names. You can use 'ALL' to subscribe to all events.

updateDate.description: Date of the creation or latest update to the subscription.

get.description: Returns the authenticated user.
Retrieves all assignments of the course.
Retrieves the assignment.

delete.description: Deletes the assignment. Returns true, if removal was successful.

post.description: Registers all groups with their current members for the assignment. Should only be used for testing or when automatic registration fails.

delete.description: Removes all registrations for the specified assignment.

post.description: Registers a group and its members for the assignment.

get.description: Retrieves all registered groups and their members for the specified assignment.

delete.description: Removes the registration of a group and its members for this assignment.

post.description: Registers a participant as a member of the specified group for the assignment.

get.description: Retrieves all registered groups and their members for the specified assignment.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

get.description: Retrieves the group that the participant is registered with for the specified assignment.

delete.description: Removes the registration of a user for the specified assignment.

post.description: Saves a configuration for a course, if it does not have one already.

get.description: Retrieves the configuration of a course.

patch.description: Updates the configuration of a course.

delete.description: Removes the complete configuration of a course. Includes group settings, admission criteria and templates.

post.description: Creates admission criteria for a course.

get.description: Retrieves a dictionary that maps matrNrs to a UserDto or null (if user does not exist in the system).
Retrieves the group settings of a course.

patch.description: Updates the group settings of a course.

get.description: Retrieves the admission criteria of a course.

patch.description: Updates the admission criteria of a course.

delete.description: Removes the admission criteria of a course.

get.description: Retrieves the assignment templates of a course.

post.description: Adds a user to the course. If the course requires a password, the correct password needs to be included in the request body.

get.description: Retrieves a specific participant and course related information about the participant.

delete.description: Removes the user from the course. Returns true, if removal was successful.

get.description: Returns a collection of users that are signed up for this course.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Compared to the participant's username and displayName with ILIKE %name%.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: Filters by a student's current group. Compared with ILIKE %groupName%.

get.summary: Get participants of course by matrNr.
get.description: Returns participants by their matrNr. The response only includes participants that were found, meaning unknown matrNrs will be ignored.
Returns an Object, which divides the course participants in two groups (in/out).
Checks, if the user is able to join the course. A user can join a course, if he's not already a member and the course is not closed.
Returns participants with their assigned evaluator for a particular assignment.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

parameters.name: assignedEvaluatorId
parameters.description: Filter by assigned evaluator.

parameters.name: excludeAlreadyReviewed
parameters.description: Excludes groups/users that have already been reviewed.

parameters.name: nameOfGroupOrUser
parameters.description: Filter by group or username.

patch.description: Assigns the given role to the user of this course.

get.description: Returns all courses that match the given filter.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

get.description: Retrieves the course, if the requesting user is a member of this course.
Retrieves the course and information that is required by its /about page.

get.summary: Get course by name and semester.

post.description: Creates a new group, if course allows group creation. If request was triggered by student, student is automatically joining the group.

get.description: Retrieves all groups that belong to the course.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the group. Compared with ILIKE %name%.

parameters.name: memberName
parameters.description: Name of a member. Compared with ILIKE %memberName%.

parameters.name: isClosed
parameters.description: If true, only includes closed groups.

parameters.name: excludeEmpty
parameters.description: If true, excludes empty groups.

post.description: Creates multiple groups with the given names or naming schema and count.
Tries to add the user to an open group with sufficient capacity. If no such group exists, creates a new group and adds the requesting user. Returns the joined group and its members.
Adds the user to the group, if constraints are fulfilled.

delete.description: Removes the user from the group.

get.description: Retrieves all group events of the course.
Retrieves groups with their assigned evaluator for an assignment

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

parameters.name: assignedEvaluatorId
parameters.description: Filter by assigned evaluator.

parameters.name: excludeAlreadyReviewed
parameters.description: Excludes groups/users that have already been reviewed.

parameters.name: nameOfGroupOrUser
parameters.description: Filter by group or username.

get.description: Returns the group with its members.
Retrieves all users that are members of the group.
Retrieves all assessments of this group.
Retrieves all users that match the specified filter.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

get.description: Retrieves the user.

delete.description: Deletes the user. Returns true, if removes was successful.

get.description: Retrieves a user by email.
Retrieves all courses that the user is a member of.

get.summary: Get group of user for course.
get.description: Retrieves the user's current group in a course.

get.summary: Get group history of user for course.
get.description: Retrieves the group history of a user in a course. Events are sorted by timestamp in descending order (new to old).
Retrieves the registered group of this user for a particular assignment.
Retrieves the assessment of a user for a specific assignment. If requested by PARTICIPANT, assessment must be EVALUATED.
Maps all assignments of a course to the user's group for the corresponding assignment.
Returns all assessments of the user in the given course. Includes the group, if assessment specified a group.

put.description: Updates the settings of a user.

get.description: Returns the settings of a user.

post.description: Maps an evaluator to a group or user. If the group or user is already assigned to another evaluator, changes the evaluator.

get.description: Returns a list of allocations, which map an evaluator to a group or user.

delete.description: Removes the assignment of the specified group or user. Throws error, if removal was unsuccessful.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Query must specify either groupId or userId.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Query must specify either groupId or userId.

post.summary: Copy assessment allocation from another assignment.
post.description: Applies the allocations from another assignment to the specified assignment.

get.description: Retrieves assessments that have been created for the assignment.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of group or user. Matched with ILIKE %name%.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Retrieves assessment of specific group.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Retrieves assessment of specific user.

parameters.name: minScore
parameters.description: Only includes assessments with achievedPoints >= minScore, if specified.

parameters.name: creatorId
parameters.description: Only includes assessments created by specified user.

put.description: Adds or updates the partial assessment with the specified key.

get.description: Retrieves the assessment.
Retrieves events of the assessment.
Returns an overview of the achieved points of all students mapped the assignments.
Returns an overview of the achieved points of a student mapped the assignments.
Returns the admission status of all participants.
Returns the admission status of all participants.

post.description: Adds a submission for the specified assignment.

delete.description: Removes all submissions of an assignment.

get.description: Retrieves the latest submission of a user or their group for a specific assignment.
Retrieves all submissions for an assignment that were submitted by this user (does not include submissions of group members).

get.summary: Get all submissions of assignment of group.
get.description: Retrieves all submissions of a group for a specific assignment.
Retrieves all submissions that match the given filter.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be skipped.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: [Pagination] The amount of elements that should be included in the response.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Filters by userId.

parameters.name: assignmentId
parameters.description: Filters by assignmentId.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Filters by groupId.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: Filters by user's displayName. Matched with ILIKE %displayName%.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: Filters by group name. Matched with ILIKE %groupName%.

post.summary: Simulate an event to notify subscribers.
post.description: Notifies all subscribers using the given notification.

get.description: Retrieves all subscribers of a course.
